title: T206 Tolstoi John McGraw with Cap DOUBLE NAME SGC 30
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: T206 Tolstoi John McGraw with Cap DOUBLE NAME SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Ok this is a fun one.

Hall of Famer John McGraw with a double name and a Tolstoi back.  Card is really nice with strong colors.  It has one solid crease that does not break color and really displays much better then the grade.

Card has full name on bottom and about half on the top.  Back is super clean and nice.

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206mcgrawdoublename.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206mcgrawdoublenamebk.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206mcgrawdoublenameclose.jpg[/IMG]

Looking to trade for some Boston Store Cards I need.  I might consider a crazy cash offer as well.  

Emails before posts.

Thanks

James G
